import React from "react"; import web from "../Images/home_pic.png"; const About = () => { return (

About Me

Hi! My name is Maah. I am a fourth-year Computer Science student at Western University. Currently, I am also interning as a Quality-Assurance Engineer at Royal Bank of Canada (RBC), Mississauga, Ontario.

Recently, I discovered my passion for illustration. Thus, I decided to self-taught myself digital illustration from scratch, and bring creative ideas to life.

When I am not coding, or pushing pixels, you'll find me hanging out with friends, working out, or binge-watching on Netflix.

); }; export default About;
